item.title: Jimmy Fallon Addresses Colbert Cancellation: “I Don’t Like What’s Going on One Bit”

item.title: Stephen Colbert ‘Late Show’ Features Cameos by Jimmy Fallon, Jon Stewart, John Oliver, Seth Meyers, Adam Sandler and More in Spoof of Coldplay Kiss-Cam Video
item.description: Stephen Colbert got an assist from some of his late-night rivals and other celebs for a send-up of the viral Coldplay kiss-cam video following CBS’s sudden decision to axe “The Late Show.&
